Write a positive review about a good electronic device:  Great sound quality and value. It is easy to use and is well built. It will take some getting used to, but is worth it. This is a great value in a portable amplifier! I purchased the Sennheiser E-MU5e after seeing the high quality of the E-M5 and the E5's lower price. The E-mu 5e's build quality is solid, and the sound quality is excellent. The only downside I have found is that there is not enough bass. The soundstage is slightly smaller than the E3 and E7 and is a bit tighter, but the sound is just not quite as detailed as the E7. The high end is not as powerful as the e-m5's, but still good. The amp does not have the same "wow factor" as the other two. The best thing about the amp is the price. This thing will last for years. The design is sleek and modern, and is extremely well built, and I am very happy with it.

The unit works with a USB stick or the USB dongle included to give it the flexibility to be used in either an outdoor or indoor location. .  (This review was collected as part of a promotion.)  Add Your Comments  There are currently no user comments listed for this product.  the GPS module is not required  Write a Review  Questions, Answers and Comments Discuss about Zumo GPS GPS for Garmin GPS Watches with the following Q&A. Learn more about Zuma GPS GPS GPS - Outdoor with your trusted GearReviews expert: Daniel from California About the GPS Unit? The GPS module on this unit is not needed for use in outdoor, as the unit can function just fine in indoor or indoors environments. This unit uses a cellular modem and a GPS receiver to function indoors. Other features: 2 Year Warranty? Yes, the unit comes with a 2 year manufacturer's warranty. It is a little bit smaller, but the unit is still small enough to fit in your pocket. Is it a good choice for your GPS watch? Yes. The Zumo is a good solution for GPS watches, as it is simple and effective, and works great indoors. It also has an automatic return home feature which allows you to return the unit if it fails to connect to a server. The only thing that you need to be aware of is that it has a limited coverage area, which means that the GPS will only be able to pinpoint a single point. I found that this was true for both indoors and outdoors. If you are a runner or a runner who wants to run with a watch, then this unit will be the best choice for you. Is the GPS unit waterproof? The unit has an IPX7 rating, meaning that it is waterproof. If the unit were to become submerged in water, it will remain operational, but

Write a positive review about a good electronic device:    I've been using this device for almost a year now. I have a large area of the house that is very humid (southern CA) and this humidifier works like a champ. It has very good efficiency and stays on 24 hours a day. I had a couple of leaks (mostly on my walls) and was able to use a little duct tape and some zip ties to seal up the holes. The other issue is the power cord. The cord is very short and can easily get in the way. It's not too much of a problem but if you are trying to use this device as a portable humidifier (I use it for my desk), it may be a problem.   A good product, but the power cable is an issue:  I really enjoy the ability of this device. The power cord is great and so is the unit. However, the cord can be a pain to work with. I would recommend a longer cord. Also, a little more time to set the humidity level could have been added. The only other complaint I have is the manual. The instructions are a little unclear on how to set it. Also the instructions can be very confusing. Overall I really enjoy using this product. I recommend it to anyone.  Excellent!  . Write a positive review about a good electronic device:  This is the best device I have bought for years and years. It has all the features I wanted in a watch for the price. If you're on the fence, do it. It's worth it. This watch has a large number of features that you'd never find on a cheaper watch. First of all, this watch comes with a battery that has a charge indicator. This is a huge plus! The watch is water resistant, and has a nice bezel. It does not look cheap at all. The face is a glossy black, and the hands are a matte black, like most of the other watches in this price range. It comes with an 18mm rubber strap that I am pretty satisfied with. I don't have any complaints about the watch itself. I do not see anything wrong with it at all, and it does exactly what it is supposed to do. The only reason I gave this a 4/5 is that it has a very small button on the side that you have to press to turn the watch on. I feel like this is a minor thing, but it's a small thing that I wouldn't change if I could. It can also be a little difficult to use if you have a lot of watch faces on your watch. I have the default watch face that is really simple and a lot easier to use. If I had to change my watch face every day, I think this watch would have been 5/5. My biggest complaint about the Watch is the battery. It runs out quickly, and after that, it's difficult to get the battery back up to where it needs to be. I don't know how to fix it. I can't see the battery ever being replaced. If it were a more expensive watch, I would be more forgiving of this, but this is still an affordable watch at $70. It would be nice if the battery was a little bit more durable. Overall, I really like the watch. It looks nice, and is very well made. I think it is a great value, and I recommend it to everyone.

Write a positive review about a good electronic device: --------------- I've had the A6 for a little over a year now, and I can't really say I'm blown away with it yet. I'm not even a big audiophile, but I've always had a taste for things "higher end" than my average headphones. I've owned the HD650, DT990, DT770, and AKG K712 Pro and I've liked all of them. The A6 isn't really anything special, but it's definitely a quality headphone that's well-built and quite well priced. The build quality isn't anything special either. It's pretty basic, but at the same time it's not too cheap or flimsy. I find the metal ear pads to be fairly comfortable and they fit very well with the rest of the design. I like the fact that they're both sealed and airy, which is good for a headphone like this. It also means they don't sound very bloated and sibilant. The soundstage is decent, but nothing to write home about. The bass is decent for a closed headphone but there's not much there in comparison to some more expensive headphones. The highs aren't really anywhere near as clear as I would have liked them to be. I have a feeling that the low end is going to be a problem with this headphone for the most part, but they're still quite enjoyable for me so far. I'll be keeping a close eye on this one as I continue to use it.Read full review  Verified purchase: Yes | Condition: New

However, it is just as easy to use as the other ports on the unit. The USB connection has been a problem for other reviewers so I am happy to have this problem solved. The product is well designed and has good features. I do recommend this product.

Write a positive review about a good electronic device:    This is the best little keyboard I have ever owned!  I had purchased an HP laptop with a mechanical keyboard in 2003, and it was a great keyboard. However, I found that the keys were not backlit well. I tried to make my own backlight keyboard and the problem is that the keyboard is a bit different from a standard mechanical keyboard. The keys are not back lit well. When you press a key on the keyboard, the keyboard lights up, but the keys on the computer are not lit. I have a Lenovo x60 laptop and it does not have the backlighting problem. I also find that the mouse buttons are a bit loose. This keyboard is also easy to use, and easy to type on.   So far, this keyboard is better than the one in my laptop, and I am very pleased with it. It is a great buy!  in addition to the excellent design, the key caps are very good and easy on the eyes. I am also very pleased to see that the backlight can be turned on or off. In addition, I have found that there are two different sizes of the keys and a standard keyboard has a different key height, so it is a nice change to have the height adjustable.   "Great product"  "This is a good keyboard and it is not heavy like some of the other ones. The key caps look nice and they fit well in the keyboard. My only issue is that I am not sure if the keycaps are backlit or not. I got the white version and I didn't get a backlight so I don't know how the keys look when the keys are back lit. Also, I would like to have a bigger spacebar, so I can easily get a finger on the spacebar instead of my thumb. If you have a larger hand than mine you may need to get a bigger key pad. This is a small issue that is easily fixed.
